attributes.action: Stop all MP's Gold Plated Pension scheme paid for by the Public Purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any MP wanting a security of a Pension opt out for a Private Scheme paid from their own money.  Not a Gold Plated pension scheme paid for by the taxpayers of this country.  The money these so called parasites earn is plenty for them to live on and pay into a Private Pension Scheme.  Give the taxpayers a break from lining their pockets with more Gold.  The ordinary person cann't afford to keep paying for this.
